biotools.summary: An ""Electronic Fluorescent Pictograph"" browser for exploring and analyzing large-scale biological data sets (using example of Arabidopsis). Explores microarray and other data for hypothesis generation. eFP Browser engine paints data from large-scale data sets onto pictographic representations of the experimental samples used to generate the data sets.

bioschemas.name: Arabidopsis eFP Browser
